tool.name: GeneSet
tool.description: Plots family of diff. or not or expressed genes

param.name: in_gene_exp_info
param.label: Gene expression score from RNA-Seq data

tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool plots the difference in gene expression based on gene families in an organism.
--------
**Tool requires**
- Gene family related information in a text file::
AT1G01010 NAC_transcription_factor AT1G01030 B3_transcription_factor AT1G01060 MYB_related_transcription_factor AT1G01070 nodulin_like AT1G01100 cytoplasmic_ribosomal
- Gene expression profile from RNA-Seq data, can be created from RDiff/DESeq::
AT1G01010 0.571091911653599 0.0992261754235973 AT1G01020 0.215031793116829 0.405420091137775 AT1G01030 0.579083819481324 0.301145128989931 AT1G01040 0.435609826790365 0.229112828243121 AT1G01046 0.580321410223207 0.57941380566501
--------
**About formats**
**Gene family info format** Gives the mapping of gene identifier to the given family of an organism
**rDiff/DESeq expression profiling** P-value generated for each gene in an organism based on multiple statistical testing on RNA-Seq reads coverage
